name: PIM
description:
Product Input Manager!

Ensure the client's satisfaction by shipping high value products!

Combine multiple products into new ones of higher value!

Rules:
 * All products give positive score upon shipping.
 * GREEN products cause positive effects to the TIMER.
 * RED products cause negative effects to the TIMER.
 * Dropping a product ontop of another, may combine the two.
 * You lose when the TIMER runs out.
 
Controls:
 * WASD = Movement
 * SPACE = Interact with products

Game developed by:
 @ixuz
 @kobeb
